name: SQL Generator
description: Executes a query on an SQL database.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Optionally specify on which nodes to run and how many instances you want on each node.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of node handler, one of SingleNode, SomeNodes, AllNodes (leave empty for local execution)

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The nodes to use for this node handler type

parameters.name: instances
parameters.description: The amount of instances per node of this handler type

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: A database url of the form jdbc:subprotocol:subname.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The database user on whose behalf the connection is being made.

parameters.name: driver
parameters.description: The driver to be used, for example org.h2.Driver.

parameters.name: flatten
parameters.description: Flatten the results, or return resultName -> results.
